title: Nifty Bullish Momentum Trade
logic: Nifty is showing signs of upward momentum. The 25050 Call option has a reasonable IV and delta, offering leveraged exposure to further price appreciation. Buying at 96 provides a good risk-reward opportunity.

title: BankNifty Short Strangle for Range-Bound Expectation
logic: BankNifty may consolidate in a range. Selling OTM call and put options allows us to profit from time decay if the price stays between the strikes at expiry. The short strangle strategy is used when a range-bound movement is expected. Considering current IV levels, the premiums are attractive for a weekly expiry.

title: Nifty Bearish Reversal Trade
logic: Nifty may face resistance at the current level. The 25000 Put option is available at a reasonable price, providing an opportunity to profit from any potential downside movement. The put option has a suitable delta for leveraged exposure to the downside.
